participant_1.background:
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
I don't always remember to give my cats enough food.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
I start networking with other writers and joining writing groups to get inspiration and feedback on my work.

participant_2.background:
I love working with my hands and getting to see the creative process through to completion.
i love book.
i have never traveled out of the country.
ferrari is my favorite car company.
Coffee and books are my best friends.

content.text: Hey!
Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing okay! I'm a bit stressed about my schoolwork but I'm excited to start writing again.
That's great! I love writing. What kind of writing do you do?
I write short stories and poems. I'm trying to get published but it's tough.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll get published one day. It's always great to see people pursuing their passions.
Thanks! I appreciate the support. I'm also a bit nervous about my job. I work at a gas station and it's not the most exciting job but it pays the bills.
That's okay! I'm sure you're great at your job.
Thanks! I try my best. What do you do for work?
I'm a carpenter. I love working with my hands and seeing the creative process through to completion.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to build things.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it out sometime.
I definitely will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about woodworking.
Me too! It's such a great hobby.
I agree! It's also a great way to relax and de-stress.
That's true! I'm always in need of a good way to relax.
Well, if you ever need someone to talk to or just want to hang out, I'm always here for you.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
No problem
